name: Jhonny & CO
description:
Jhonny & CO is a 2d point-and-click game in which you will have to use your ability to click and react quickly to annoyances that will prevent you from achieving the goal of the game. It is recommendable to play with a mouse and have some speed when typing.

I have to warn you that this game contains annoying and noisy sounds and maybe

·What do you need to play?

Just a mouse , CTRL+C , CTRL+V , notepad and patience

i hope you enjoy this game ;)
